I am a PhD Candidate in the Department of [REC](https://www.arch.hku.hk/programmes_/rec/) at HKU. <br>
My research interests include REITs, government behaviors, and machine learning. 


I enjoy [playing video games](https://store.steampowered.com/agecheck/app/2358720/), [waching movies](https://movie.douban.com/subject/1292434/), [listeing to music](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-pCAngjeOw), [reading novels](https://book.douban.com/subject/4913064/) and hiking.
